premise_source_doc_sentence: Baltimore 's Ray Lewis , a native of Lakeland , Florida , less than an hour from Super Bowl host city Tampa , who made 3 solo tackles , 2 assists , and blocked 4 passes , became the second linebacker to be named Super Bowl MVP after Chuck Howley in Super Bowl V.
